com.activities.am1

Class ListQuestionsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.app.ListActivity
              • com.activities.am1.ListQuestionsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ListQuestionsActivity
extends android.app.ListActivity
    ListPublicQuestionActivity Exteds ListActivity class, it shows the questions, using the menu button user can also create a new question, logout or sort the list by Rates or Dates. Created on November 18, 2012
    Author:
    Valentina Pontillo v.pontillo@studenti.unina.it Edited by Bernardo Plaza Last edited on January 23th, 2013

      void refresh()
      Refresh the question list ç
      void refreshQuestionList()
      Update the questionListAdapter
      void sortByDate()
      Used a comparator with questionsList to sort the list by date the boolean toggleDate is used to change the order of the sorting from the newest question to older or viceversa
      void sortByRates()
      Used a comparator with questionsList to sort the list by number of rates the boolean toggleRate is used to change the order of the sorting from the highest number of rates to lower or viceversa
